About.title: About us
About.description: This application is a result of our work as a team while studying at RS School, React 2024 Q3 course. We created a light-weight versions of Postman and GraphiQL, combined in one app.

SignIn.title: Sign In
SignIn.passwordLength: Password must be at least {passwordLength} symbol
SignIn.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
SignIn.passwordUppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
SignIn.passwordLowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
SignIn.passwordSpecialChar: Must contain at least one special character

SignUp.name: Name
SignUp.nameUppercase: The first letter must be uppercased
SignUp.passwordLength: Password must be at least {passwordLength} symbol
SignUp.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
SignUp.passwordUppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
SignUp.passwordLowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
SignUp.passwordSpecialChar: Must contain at least one special character
